snippet: An editor who ruffled some feathers at The Washington Post will head the new territories.
abstract: Media Decoder blog; Politico hires Susan Glasser to run its expansion into opinion from prominent outside voices and long-form storytelling; Glasser is known as polarizing figure among national reporters during her tenure at The Washington Post.
lead_paragraph: An editor who ruffled some feathers at The Washington Post will head the new territories.
